note: subject/participant Identifier within project
subject identifier used by dbGaP (if available)
consent abbreviation (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4721915/table/pgen.1005772.t001/?report=objectonly)
short name for study as defined by CC
flag if subject has been submitted to dbGaP
PHS ID for study
reported sex
sample identifier
sample identifier used by dbGaP (if available)
tissue type of sample (UBERON concepts)
age of subject when sample was collected
processing batch for sample (e.g. genotyping plate)
sample set identifier

ref: from: sample_set_id, genotyping_center, array_manufacturer, array_name, genotype_calling_software, reference_assembly

note: name of genotyping center
name of array manufacturer (e.g. Illumina, Affymetrix)
name of genotyping array (e.g. OmniExpress)
software and version used for genotype calling (e.g. GenomeStudio v2.0.5)
reference genome assembly that the submitted data is mapped to
md5 checksum for the file
absolute file path in cloud storage
if source data is in PRIMED, provide array_dataset_id
source of input data (e.g. array name, WES, targeted sequencing)
reference panel with version (e.g. 1000G Phase 3, TOPMed version 2)
software and version used for imputation (e.g. IMPUTE2 v2.3.2)
description of quality filter applied to data (e.g. info > 0.9)
reference genome assembly that the submitted data is mapped to
md5 checksum for the file
absolute file path in cloud storage

ref: from: sample_set_id, seq_center, reference_assembly, alignment_method, sequencing_assay, seq_platform

note: name of sequencing center
reference genome assembly that the submitted data is mapped to
alignment method used (e.g. BWA-MEM)
CCDG example: https://github.com/CCDG/Pipeline-Standardization/blob/master/PipelineStandard.md
type of sequencing assay performed (e.g. WGS, WES)
exome capture platform (if applicable)
name of capture region bed file (if applicable)
machine identifier for sequencer
sequencing platform used (e.g. Illumina HiSeq X)
average target size for DNA fragments
average target sequencing depth
paired end or single end
md5 checksum for the file
absolute file path in cloud storage
description of file contents
